entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence Trump: "We've tested 6.5 million Americans for Coronavirus—more than any other country on Earth." “One of the greatest buildups we’ve ever had.”
We are 5% population on Earth, but we have 33.77% cases and 27.47% deaths of COVID-19 on Earth. https://t.co/MhJ19j5VOY
